tool_description: Have you ever thought that the prices and limitations of Google Translate are so frustrating? If you agree with that question you're in the right place, you can implement this API in your projects without deal with so complicated stuffs. The only thing you have to do is to choose the plan that fit your needs the best.
name: Trans-lator
title: Trans-lator

api_list.name: Languages
api_list.description: Get the list of the languages which can be used to translate a text
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gybra-trans-lator.p.rapidapi.com/languages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gybra-trans-lator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://gybra-trans-lator.p.rapidapi.com/languages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gybra-trans-lator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Text2Speech file
api_list.description: Download the text2speech audio file in base64 format

required_parameters.name: file
required_parameters.description: the name of the file audio

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gybra-trans-lator.p.rapidapi.com/download/1407941930.mp3"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gybra-trans-lator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://gybra-trans-lator.p.rapidapi.com/download/{file}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gybra-trans-lator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Translate
api_list.description: Translate the text from a language to another

required_parameters.name: from
required_parameters.description: the source language of the text will be translated

required_parameters.name: to
required_parameters.description: the language of the resultant translate text

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: the text you want to translate

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gybra-trans-lator.p.rapidapi.com/translate/en/it/hi"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gybra-trans-lator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://gybra-trans-lator.p.rapidapi.com/translate/{is_from}/{to}/{text}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gybra-trans-lator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
